summary: 2005  was a common year starting on Saturday of the Gregorian calendar.
full_text: Birgit Nilsson  was a celebrated Swedish dramatic soprano who specialized in operatic works of Wagner and Strauss, though she sang the operas of many other composers, including Verdi and Puccini. Her voice was noted for its overwhelming force, bountiful reserves of power, and the gleaming brilliance and clarity in the upper register.
title: Birgit Nilsson
